SA05n872:6: prāptaṃ tvayā jñānamanantadharmaṃ yenākariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam || 2 ||
SA05n872:7: pravartitaṃ yena sudharmacakraṃ yasmin mahī sodadhiśailarājā |
SA05n872:8: ānanditeva calitā hyajasraṃ namo'stu tubhyaṃ tribhavādhipāya || 3 ||
SA05n872:9: yasmiṃśca vātāstriguṇena yuktā vavurnabhasto nipatanti vastrāḥ(rṣāḥ) |
SA05n872:10: vicitrapuṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namo'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha || 4 ||
SA05n872:12: jitaṃ tvayaikena nirāyudhena namo'stu tubhyaṃ balavartanāya || 5 ||
SA05n872:16: tuṣitāyuto janma cakāra martye namo'stu tubhyaṃ varabodhirāja || 7 ||
SA05n872:17: samyak pratijñāṃ pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure janaughaḥ |
SA05n872:18: tadarthamāyāsi ca martyaloke namo'stu tubhyaṃ sumahatpratijña || 8 ||
SA05n872:19: yaścāṣṭakaṃ brahmakṛtaṃ supuṇyaṃ paṭhiṣyati śākyavarāgrataḥ sthaḥ |
SA05n872:20: duḥkhaṃ mahāpāpabhayaṃ ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā || 9 ||
